data.title: Mavis Leno
data.meta_description: Mavis Leno. Producer: Stigma Monatsblutung. Mavis Leno was born on 5 September 1946 in San Francisco, California, USA. She is a producer, known for Stigma Monatsblutung (2018), 60 Minutes (1968) and Entertainment Tonight (1981). She has been married to Jay Leno since 30 November 1980.
data.text:
First met her future husband, Jay Leno, when he was performing in a Los Angeles comedy club. She was in the audience and was laughing at all his jokes at the right time.

Her father was E.A. Nicholson, a character actor on TV shows and movies. He played the hooded executioner in the film, Kaltbl√ºtig (1967).
